title: Buffalo shooting: NY probes 'bone-chilling' social media role
description: Prosecutors will ask whether social platforms were "used to stream, promote, or plan" the murders.

title: President Rodrigo Chaves says Costa Rica is at war with Conti hackers
description: The Conti cartel, which is thought to be run from Russia, has upped its ransom demand to $20m (£16m).

title: Netflix cuts 150 US-based jobs after losing subscribers
description: The US streaming giant is forced to lay off staff to minimise cost of viewers quitting the service.
